head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROBERTS, BEVERLY N.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROBERTS, BEVERLY N.

block.p: ROBERTS--Beverly N., 92, at home on December 14, 2003. Professor, Chairman of English, A&T University; English and art teacher, Principal and field supervisor, NYC Board of Education. Survived by children Adrienne of Denver, Antoinette and Richard, both of DC; brother Gerald; sister Wilhelmina; 2 grandchildren; relatives. Viewing Friday, December 19, 4-7 PM, J. Foster Phillips Funeral Home, 179-24 Linden Blvd, Jamaica, NY. Service 7 PM. Interment in Columbia, SC.
